title: AES - DE - Generative AI Application Developers
description:
AI Engineer


7\+ YRS


PUNE/HYDERABAD/BANGALORE  



Looking for a workplace where people realize their full potential, are recognized for the impact they make, and enjoy the company of the peers they work with? Welcome to Zensar! Read on for more details on the role and about us.  



**Skills required to contribute:**

**Requirements**

* Design and build agentic AI systems: Develop autonomous AI agents capable of planning, reasoning, and executing complex, multi\-step tasks across different systems with minimal human intervention.
* Automate business workflows: Identify and automate repetitive, time\-consuming business processes using AI agents, freeing up human resources for more strategic work.
* Enhance developer efficiency: Create AI\-powered tools and agents that assist developers throughout the software development lifecycle (SDLC). This includes automating code generation, refactoring, debugging, and documentation.
* Improve business KPIs: Collaborate with business stakeholders to identify critical performance indicators and design AI solutions that directly contribute to their improvement, such as increased revenue, reduced costs, or higher customer satisfaction.
* Integrate AI agents with enterprise systems: Develop and manage APIs and integrations for AI agents to interact with a wide range of company platforms, including databases, collaboration tools, and existing software.
* Orchestrate multi\-agent workflows: Utilize frameworks to coordinate multiple AI agents in collaborative workflows to solve larger business challenges.
* Maintain ethical and safety standards: Implement guardrails and monitoring to ensure AI agents operate responsibly, are secure from adversarial attacks (like prompt injection), and adhere to ethical guidelines.
Conduct research and stay current: Keep up with the latest advancements in agentic AI, LLMs, and development practices. Apply this knowledge to continuously improve solutions and identify new opportunities for AI implementation  
* 

**Experience**

* Overall 7 \~ 8 years of experience with proven experience (4\+ years) in AI/ML software development, focusing on building agentic or autonomous systems.
* Proficiency in Python: Strong, demonstrated expertise in Python and related AI/ML libraries like PyTorch, TensorFlow, and Hugging Face.
* Agentic Frameworks: Hands\-on experience with AI agent orchestration frameworks
* API and Integration: Solid background in API development using frameworks like FastAPI or Flask, and experience integrating diverse systems.
* Cloud Platforms: Experience with cloud computing environments (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and services relevant to AI deployment.
* Databases: Experience with both SQL and vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Chroma) for retrieval\-augmented generation (RAG) and memory systems.
Soft Skills: Strong problem\-solving abilities, excellent communication skills for collaborating with cross\-functional teams, and the ability to translate technical concepts for non\-technical stakeholders  
* 

Advantage Zensar  



We are a digital solutions and technology services company that partners with global organizations across industries to achieve digital transformation. With a strong track record of innovation, investment in digital solutions, and commitment to client success, at Zensar, you can help clients achieve new thresholds of performance. A subsidiary of RPG Group, Zensar has its HQ in India, and offices across the world, including Mexico, South Africa, UK and USA.  



Zensar is all about celebrating individuality, creativity, innovation, and flexibility. We hire based on values, talent, and the potential necessary to fill a given job profile, irrespective of nationality, sexuality, race, color, and creed. We also put in policies to empower this assorted talent pool with the right environment for growth.  



At Zensar, you Grow, Own, Achieve, Learn.  



Learn more about our culture: https://www.zensar.com/careers/who\-we\-are  



**Ready to \#ExperienceZensar?**

Begin your application by clicking on the ‘Apply Online’ button below.


Be sure to have your resume handy!


If you’re having trouble applying, drop a line to careers@zensar.com.

description:

Fast forward to today — ServiceNow stands as a global market leader, bringing innovative AI\-enhanced technology to over 8,100 customers, including 85% of the Fortune 500®. Our intelligent cloud\-based platform seamlessly connects people, systems, and processes to empower organizations to find smarter, faster, and better ways to work. But this is just the beginning of our journey. Join us as we pursue our purpose to make the world work better for everyone.

 **Job Description**  

As a member of our Solution Consulting team, you will have a major impact on our future success by supporting the Employee Experience, Customer Workflow, ITX Solution Sales. You will help guide revenue for one of our products with the support and partnership of Sales, Product Management, and the executive team. This is a hands\-on technical consultant who can go wide and deep on solution delivery and solution positioning during sales cycles.

**What you get to do in this role:**


The Solution Consultant is a technical consultant with the advanced ability to develop, position and provide product\-specific solutions during sales cycles while achieving quarterly and annual sales goals for an assigned territory.

* Support product sales as a technical and domain expert of a client\-facing sales team
* Lead discovery workshops to determine customers' challenges and give product demonstrations to align our solution with customer needs
* Answer product feature and technical questions from customers, channel partners and ServiceNow colleagues
* Guide strategic programs in top accounts such as customer journey sessions for roadmap and outcome agreement
* Provide feedback to product management about product enhancements that can address customer needs and guide additional value
* Share and learn best practices and re\-usable assets with other Solution Consultants to enhance the quality and efficiency of the team
* Stay current on competitive analysis and market differentiation
* Support marketing events including executive briefings, conferences, user groups, and trade shows

  

**Qualifications** **To be successful in this role you have:**

* Experience in leveraging or critically thinking about how to integrate AI into work processes, decision\-making, or problem\-solving. This may include using AI\-powered tools, automating workflows, analyzing AI\-driven insights, or exploring AI's potential impact on the function or industry.
* 5\+ years of pre\-sales solution consulting or sales engineering experience
* Proficiency with the ServiceNow platform or technical expertise with cloud software solutions
* Experience working collaboratively with product management, product marketing, partners, and professional services
* Territory management skills, including pipeline building and working with Sales counterpart to promote execution excellence

If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are unable to use this online application and need an alternative method to apply, please contact globaltalentss@servicenow.com for assistance.

**Export Control Regulations**


For positions requiring access to controlled technology subject to export control regulations, including the U.S. Export Administration Regulations (EAR), ServiceNow may be required to obtain export control approval from government authorities for certain individuals. All employment is contingent upon ServiceNow obtaining any export license or other approval that may be required by relevant export control authorities.

title: AI Developer
description:
**About the Role**

Hiring an AI Engineer with **deep practical experience** in working with **LLMs, RAG pipelines, knowledge graphs, agents, and automation workflows**.  
You will build production\-grade AI systems that can autonomously retrieve information, process documents, trigger actions, and integrate with external tools/APIs.

**Must be able to work collaboratively during U.S. Central Time (CST) hours.**

This role is ideal for someone who understands both **AI architecture** and **software engineering**, and can take a problem from concept → prototype → production.

**Key Responsibilities LLM Engineering \& Architecture**

* Design, develop, and optimize **RAG systems** (vector storage, chunking, retrieval tuning, hybrid search).
* Implement **Graph\-RAG**, knowledge\-graph creation, entity \+ relationship extraction.
* Build and fine\-tune LLMs (LoRA, QLoRA, instruction tuning).
* Evaluate LLM responses using metrics like **RAGAS**, precision/recall, and custom evaluation frameworks.
* Build multi\-step **AI agents** using LangChain, LangGraph, or custom frameworks.
* Create **task automation pipelines** (email automation, marketing automation, workflow orchestration).
* Integrate tools such as DuckDuckGo Search, Browser automation, custom Python tools, and API connectors.
* Implement error handling, retries, monitoring, logging, and chain debugging.
* Design **FastAPI** or Django\-based backends for AI services.
* Create REST APIs to expose LLM workflows to frontend or other services.
* Deploy models on cloud GPU providers (AWS, GCP, Nebius, TensorDock, etc.).
* Build scalable data pipelines for document ingestion, cleaning, and extraction.
* Work with embeddings, chunking strategies, token optimization, and retrieval performance tuning.
* Manage vector DBs: **FAISS / Chroma / Pinecone / Weaviate**, etc.
* Deploy and scale LLMs using vLLM, Hugging Face TGI, or custom inference servers.
* Set up Docker, CI/CD, versioning, logging, and monitoring pipelines.
* Strong understanding of transformers, embeddings, tokenization.
* Experience with **LangChain**, **LangGraph**, **LlamaIndex**, or custom agent frameworks.
* Hands\-on with **RAG**, **Graph\-RAG**, chunking, hybrid search, metadata\-based retrieval.
* Ability to evaluate and debug LLM hallucinations \+ retrieval gaps.
* Python (mandatory)
* FastAPI, Flask, or Django
* Docker, Git, CI/CD
* Cloud deployment: AWS/GCP/Azure, or GPU clouds
* Vector DB experience (FAISS, Pinecone, Chroma, Weaviate)

**Good to Have**

* Experience in knowledge\-graph or Neo4j
* Experience in automation tools (Zapier, n8n, Make)
* Experience in email automation or marketing workflows
* UI knowledge (React/Next.js) is a bonus
* Experience with multi\-agent systems / autonomous agents

**What We’re Looking For**

* Someone who can **build end\-to\-end AI systems**, not just chatbots.
* Someone who understands **production scaling**, not just notebooks.
* Someone who can think in terms of **agents, graph\-based retrieval, automation flows**.
* Someone who stays updated on **LLM architectures, inference optimizationss.**

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: ₹20,000\.00 \- ₹35,000\.00 per month

Expected Start Date: 01/12/2025

title: AI Developer
description:
**About the Role**

We are hiring an AI Engineer with strong experience in large language models, retrieval systems, knowledge graphs, and automation workflows. The engineer will build production\-ready AI systems that retrieve information, process documents, trigger automated actions, and integrate with external tools and APIs.  
This position is suited for someone who understands both AI architecture and software engineering and can deliver solutions from design to deployment.

**ResponsibilitiesLLM Engineering**

* Design and optimize Retrieval\-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems.
* Build knowledge graphs and perform entity and relationship extraction.
* Fine\-tune LLMs using LoRA, QLoRA, and instruction tuning methods.
* Evaluate model outputs using RAG evaluation metrics such as RAGAS.

**AI Agents and Automation**

* Build multi\-step AI agents using frameworks such as LangChain or LangGraph.
* Create automation workflows including email automation, marketing automation, and document processing.
* Integrate third\-party tools and APIs into AI systems.

**Backend and Infrastructure**

* Develop backend services using FastAPI or Django.
* Build REST APIs for AI features.
* Deploy AI models on cloud GPU platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Nebius.
* Manage vector databases such as FAISS, Pinecone, Chroma, or Weaviate.

**MLOps**

* Deploy and scale LLMs using vLLM or Hugging Face TGI.
* Set up Docker environments, CI/CD pipelines, and monitoring tools.
* Build data pipelines for document ingestion and processing.

**Required Skills**

* Strong knowledge of transformers, embeddings, and tokenization.
* Experience in RAG, Graph\-RAG, hybrid retrieval, and metadata\-based retrieval.
* Proficiency in Python.
* Experience with FastAPI, Flask, or Django.
* Experience with Docker, Git, and CI/CD.
* Cloud deployment experience with AWS, GCP, Azure, or GPU cloud providers.
* Experience with vector databases.

**Preferred Skills**

* Knowledge\-graph or Neo4j experience.
* Experience with tools like Zapier, n8n, or Make for automation.
* Understanding of email marketing automation.
* Experience with React or Next.js.
* Experience with multi\-agent AI systems.

**What We’re Looking For**

We are seeking someone who can build end\-to\-end AI systems, understands production\-level scalability, and can design workflows involving agents, graph\-based retrieval, and automation. The ideal candidate stays updated on current LLM architectures and best practices.

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: From ₹20,000\.00 per month

Expected Start Date: 10/12/2025

title: Python Developer – AI & Core Python
description:
**Job Title:** Python Developer

**Location:** **REMOTE/ONSITE**

**About the Role:**  
We are seeking an experienced **Python Developer** with strong expertise in **Core Python** and hands\-on experience in **Artificial Intelligence (AI)** technologies. The ideal candidate will work on backend development, automation, AI model integration, and data\-driven solutions. You will collaborate with cross\-functional teams to build scalable, intelligent applications.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Develop, optimize, and maintain applications using **Core Python**.
* Design and integrate **AI/ML models** into applications.
* Work with machine learning pipelines, model inference, and data processing workflows.
* Build and manage **RESTful APIs** and backend logic for AI\-enabled applications.
* Write clean, reusable, and efficient code following industry best practices.
* Develop automation scripts and AI\-based solutions for business problems.
* Debug, troubleshoot, and enhance existing AI and Python applications.
* Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and engineers to deliver intelligent features.
* Document technical designs, AI workflows, and code modules.

**Required Skills \& Qualifications**

* **5 years of experience** as a Python Developer (Core Python is mandatory).
* Hands\-on experience in **AI / Machine Learning**, including model development or integration.
* Strong understanding of Python fundamentals:
* Data structures, OOP, multithreading, decorators, generators
* Exception handling and module development
* Experience with **AI/ML libraries** such as:
* TensorFlow / PyTorch / Scikit\-learn / Keras (any one or more)
* Experience with **NLP, computer vision, or predictive analytics** is an added advantage.
* Experience in building and consuming **REST APIs**.
* Strong knowledge of databases (MySQL/PostgreSQL/SQLite).
* Familiarity with Git, version control, and CI/CD workflows.
* Strong debugging, analytical, and problem\-solving skills.

**Good to Have**

* Experience with **Large Language Model (LLM)** integration (OpenAI, Hugging Face, etc.).
* Knowledge of **Docker** and containerized deployments.
* Exposure to cloud services (AWS, Azure, or GCP) for AI model hosting.
* Understanding of data engineering concepts.

**Education**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, AI/ML, Data Science, or related field preferred.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: ₹40,000\.00 \- ₹60,000\.00 per month

Application Question(s):

* What is your current ctc,expected and notice period ?
* How many years of experience do you have working with Core Python?
* Do you have hands\-on experience working with AI/ML models?
* Are you experienced in building and consuming RESTful APIs?
* Which databases have you worked with?

Work Location: In person

Application Deadline: 27/06/2025  
Expected Start Date: 12/07/2025

title: Engineer, IT, AI Enablement
description:
**Our vision is to transform how the world uses information to enrich life for** ***all*****.**

Micron Technology is a world leader in innovating memory and storage solutions that accelerate the transformation of information into intelligence, inspiring the world to learn, communicate and advance faster than ever.


Join Micron’s AI Enablement team and help accelerate enterprise\-wide AI adoption. This role is designed for engineers passionate about applying AI to real\-world business challenges. You will work on rapid prototyping, automation, and integration of AI solutions that enhance productivity and innovation across diverse business areas.


Key Responsibilities:

* **AI Solution Development:** Build and deploy AI\-driven tools and workflows using platforms like **Copilot Studio**, **UiPath**, and other automation frameworks.
* **Integration \& Enablement:** Connect AI agents with enterprise systems (e.g., SharePoint, M365\), external APIs, knowledge bases, and ensure seamless interoperability.
* **Process Automation:** Identify repetitive tasks and design intelligent automation solutions to improve efficiency.
* **Collaboration \& Training:** Partner with cross\-functional teams to enable AI literacy, create best\-practice documentation, and support internal training sessions.
* **Governance \& Compliance:** Collaborate with cybersecurity teams to enforce data protection, threat modeling and ensure all AI solutions adhere to security, ethical, and compliance standards.
* **Security \& Identity Integration**
* Ensure secure agent interactions using encryption, authentication, and authorization mechanisms.
* Integrate agents with identity platforms (e.g., OAuth2, OIDC, SAML, Entra ID, AD FS, etc.) for secure access control.
* **Continuous Improvement:** Collect feedback, iterate solutions, and contribute to a culture of innovation and scalability.

Required Skills \& Qualifications:

* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, AI, Machine Learning, Data Science or related field.
* Fresh graduates or professionals with up to 2 years of experience in software development or AI/ML engineering.
* Strong understanding of **AI concepts**, **machine learning pipelines**, and **automation tools**.
* Hands\-on experience or coursework in **Copilot Studio**, **UiPath**, and **SharePoint**.
* Knowledge with cloud AI platforms: **Azure AI Foundry, AWS Bedrock, and/or Google Vertex AI**.
* Knowledge with scalable context management solutions including retrieval\-augmented generation **(RAG**), semantic chunking, and memory persistence for long\-horizon tasks
* Implement multi\-agent workflows for complex tasks such as decision\-making, negotiation, and collaborative problem\-solving.
* Ability to design, implement, and manage context\-aware systems that leverage **Model Context Protocol (MCP)** to maintain continuity across user interactions, including prompt engineering, memory management, and context window optimization for large language models.
* Familiarity with **cloud platforms**, **API integrations**, and **data quality validation**.
* Familiarity with agent orchestration frameworks and multi\-agent systems using **A2A** (Agent to Agent).
* Knowledge of common development languages
* .Net, C\#, Python, Java, API development, SQL, PowerShell, Unix shell scripting
* Excellent problem\-solving skills and ability to work in fast\-paced, agile environments.
* Strong communication skills for cross\-team collaboration.

Preferred Attributes:

* Exposure to **generative AI**, **prompt engineering**, or **agent\-based systems**.
* Interest in AI governance, security, and ethical frameworks.
* Ability to adapt quickly and deliver “quick wins” while maintaining enterprise standards.

Why Join Us?

* Work on cutting\-edge AI initiatives that transform enterprise operations.
* Collaborate with global teams and gain hands\-on experience in AI enablement.
* Be part of a program that values creativity, agility, and continuous learning.
 **About Micron Technology, Inc.**


We are an industry leader in innovative memory and storage solutions transforming how the world uses information to enrich life *for all*. With a relentless focus on our customers, technology leadership, and manufacturing and operational excellence, Micron delivers a rich portfolio of high\-performance DRAM, NAND, and NOR memory and storage products through our Micron® and Crucial® brands. Every day, the innovations that our people create fuel the data economy, enabling advances in artificial intelligence and 5G applications that unleash opportunities — from the data center to the intelligent edge and across the client and mobile user experience.  

  

To learn more, please visit micron.com/careers  

  

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.  

  

To request assistance with the application process and/or for reasonable accommodations, please contact hrsupport\_india@micron.com


Micron Prohibits the use of child labor and complies with all applicable laws, rules, regulations, and other international and industry labor standards.


Micron does not charge candidates any recruitment fees or unlawfully collect any other payment from candidates as consideration for their employment with Micron.


AI alert**:** Candidates are encouraged to use AI tools to enhance their resume and/or application materials. However, all information provided must be accurate and reflect the candidate's true skills and experiences. Misuse of AI to fabricate or misrepresent qualifications will result in immediate disqualification.


Fraud alert: Micron advises job seekers to be cautious of unsolicited job offers and to verify the authenticity of any communication claiming to be from Micron by checking the official Micron careers website in the About Micron Technology, Inc.

title: Proposal Manager- Electrical and Instrumentation (Ahmedabad)
description:
**About the Role**

We are an industrial automation \& control panel manufacturer serving process industries in India and overseas. We design and supply **MCC/PCC, PLC/DCS/Safety system panels, marshalling/junction boxes and complete automation solutions**.

We are looking for an experienced **Proposal Manager** who can **standardise and speed up our proposal process**, guide our proposal team, and ensure that every techno\-commercial offer is technically correct, commercially sound and compliant with **UL, CE and export region–specific standards**, including **safe and hazardous area** requirements.

**Key Responsibilities**

**1\. Proposal Strategy \& Standardisation**

* Own the **end\-to\-end proposal process** for electrical \& automation projects (RFQ to final submission).
* **Standardise proposals** by creating and maintaining:
* Standard BOQ templates
* Costing norms and checklists
* Standard technical offer and commercial offer formats
* Typical scope, inclusions/exclusions and assumptions
* Continuously work to **reduce turnaround time** for proposals while maintaining accuracy and compliance.
* Implement **version control, naming conventions and documentation discipline** for all proposals.

**2\. Team Guidance \& Review**

* Lead and mentor a **proposal / estimation team** (proposal engineers / executives).
* Allocate RFQs and monitor progress to ensure **on\-time submissions**.
* **Review and guide** team members on:
* Technical sizing and selection
* Compliance to standards and customer specs
* Pricing logic, margins and commercial terms
* Conduct **final review** of all major techno\-commercial offers before submission.

**3\. Technical \& Standards Expertise**

* Interpret **customer RFQs, datasheets, SLDs, I/O lists, cause \& effect, cable schedules and specifications**.
* Ensure proposals comply with:
* **UL standards** (e.g. UL508A, UL698A/UL698B, UL 121201, UL 845, etc. as applicable)
* **CE / IEC standards** (e.g. IEC 61439 for LV switchgear, relevant EN/IEC standards)
* **Export region–specific approvals** (e.g. ATEX, IECEx, NEC/CEC where required).
* Differentiate and apply requirements for **safe area vs hazardous area** instrumentation and control panels:
* Knowledge of Zone / Division classification
* Ex\-protection concepts (Ex d, Ex e, Ex i, etc.)
* Selection of field devices, enclosures, cable glands, barriers/isolators.
* Provide guidance on **earthing, protection coordination, short\-circuit ratings, temperature rise, IP/NEMA ratings, etc.**

**4\. Electrical \& Automation Solutioning**

* Work with design \& application teams to define:
* **MCC/PCC architecture, busbar sizing, feeder configurations**
* **PLC/DCS/Safety system architectures** (CPU/Redundancy, I/O distribution, networking, SCADA/HMI, historian).
* Understand and propose solutions for:
* **PLC, SCADA, DCS and Safety PLC (SIS) systems**
* VFD/soft starters and motor control schemes
* Instrumentation signals (AI/AO/DI/DO) and field instrumentation scope.
* Validate that proposed solutions are **practically implementable**, optimised for cost vs reliability and aligned with the customer’s specifications and standards.

**5\. Customer \& OEM Coordination**

* Work closely with **sales engineers** during pre\-bid and post\-bid discussions, technical clarifications and negotiations.
* Liaise with **OEMs and distributors** (automation, switchgear, hazardous area equipment) to obtain technical support, budgetary prices and final quotes.
* Participate in **review meetings with customers/consultants/EPCs** to clarify technical and commercial aspects of offers.

**6\. Commercial \& Win\-Loss Analysis**

* Build and maintain structured **cost sheets** for material, engineering, FAT/SAT, site services and contingency.
* Review commercial terms: payment terms, delivery, LD, warranty, performance guarantees, insurance, taxes/duties, etc.
* Track **win/loss ratios**, analyse reasons for loss and recommend corrective actions in pricing, positioning and proposal strategy.

**Eligibility / Qualifications**

**Must Have**

* B.E./B.Tech or Diploma in **Electrical / Instrumentation / Electronics**.
* **5–15 years** of experience in **proposals / estimation / tendering** for:
* Electrical control panels (MCC, PCC, PLC, marshalling, JB panels), and/or
* PLC/DCS/SCADA/Safety systems for process industries.
* Proven experience in preparing and reviewing **techno\-commercial offers** independently.
* Strong **electrical knowledge**:
* LV switchgear, protection, busbar sizing, short\-circuit levels, cable sizing basics.
* Strong **automation knowledge**:
* PLC/DCS architectures, I/O sizing, networking, SCADA/HMI, Safety systems (SIS).
* Practical understanding of **safe vs hazardous area** design requirements for instrumentation and control panels.
* Hands\-on experience with at least one major automation brand (**Rockwell / Siemens / Schneider / ABB / etc.**).
* Advanced skills in **MS Excel** (costing, what\-if, comparison) and good command of **MS Word/PowerPoint**.
* Strong written and verbal communication in **English** (Hindi/Gujarati an added advantage).

**Good to Have**

* Experience with projects requiring **UL, CE, ATEX, IECEx or other export certifications/approvals**.
* Exposure to **international projects / exports**.
* Experience leading a **small proposals team** or mentoring junior engineers.

**Compensation \& Benefits**

* Competitive salary: **Industry Leading**.
* Opportunity to work on **complex, global\-standard projects** and build deep expertise in **UL/CE/hazardous area compliant systems**.
* Professional, growth\-oriented work environment.

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: ₹505,638\.99 \- ₹2,005,770\.59 per year

Benefits:

* Paid sick time
* Paid time off
* Provident Fund

Application Question(s):

* Have you led or supervised a proposals/estimation team before (allocation of RFQs, review of offers, final sign\-off)?
* Have you prepared proposals that involved UL / CE / export region–specific standards or approvals (e.g. UL508A, UL698A, IEC 61439, CE, ATEX, IECEx)?
* Do you have experience preparing proposals for hazardous area (Zone/Division) panels or systems?
* What is your current notice period?
* What is your current / last drawn annual CTC (in ₹ lakh per annum)?
* What is your expected annual CTC (in ₹ lakh per annum)?

Experience:

* proposals/tendering for E\&I Control Panels: 5 years (Required)

Location:

* Changodar, Ahmedabad, Gujarat (Required)

Work Location: In person

title: Compiler Developer and System Programer
description:
**Hiring Now**: Compiler Developer \& System Programmer (C Programming / Systems / Compiler Internals)

**Location**: Bangalore

**Experience**: 5\+ years

**Positions**: Multiple (Contract)

**Start Date**: Immediate Joiners Preferred

We are hiring strong C programmers and system\-level engineers to support a high\-impact enterprise compiler and runtime modernization initiative for a Tier\-1 technology customer. The work focuses on migrating large\-scale database and system components from an older proprietary compiler toolchain to a modern LLVM\-based toolchain.

While direct compiler development experience is a plus, we are also interested in engineers with strong debugging, systems knowledge and the ability to reason deeply about low\-level behavior in complex, performance\-critical environments.

This role involves close collaboration with senior engineers from the customer organization, exposure to real\-world production systems, and a deep dive into compiler behavior, runtime debugging, and performance optimization.

One of the available positions includes work on optimizing ONNX Runtime for a UNIX\-based environment, offering hands\-on experience at the intersection of compilers, performance engineering, and AI acceleration frameworks.

**Responsibilities**

* Port and adapt large\-scale system/database code from a legacy compiler toolchain to a modern LLVM\-based toolchain on a UNIX platform.
* Investigate and resolve complex compile\-time and runtime issues to ensure production\-grade stability.
* Analyze application runtime behavior to identify performance bottlenecks and collaborate with customer engineering teams to implement optimizations.
* For ONNX\-related roles, Enhance ONNX Runtime execution performance on UNIX systems using techniques such as:
* Compiler and code\-generation tuning
* Vectorization
* Multi\-threading/parallelization
* Custom ops
* Numerical optimization
* Required Skills
* Strong C programming experience, ideally using compilers such as GCC, Clang/LLVM, AOCC, or similar toolchains.
* Deep expertise in system programming on UNIX/Linux (memory management, threading, IPC, process control, performance tuning).
* Exceptional debugging and root\-cause analysis skills, with or without a debugger.

**Preferred Skills**

* Hands\-on experience with GDB or similar debugging tools.
* Familiarity with compiler internals or contributions to compiler/open\-source toolchain projects.
* Experience with LLVM, or understanding of compiler optimization pipelines.
* Exposure to C\+\+, Java, JDK/JVM internals.
* Performance analysis experience using tools such as:
* Valgrind
* Perf
* PMU tools
* Pipestat
* Nmon
* Experience with distributed/parallel applications.
* Background in ONNX Runtime, numerical algorithms, or performance\-critical AI workloads.

Job Type: Full\-time

title: Senior Django/Python Software Engineer
description:
CapeZero (https://www.capezero.com/) is a seed\-stage cleantech startup making an impact at the intersection of clean energy, finance, and technology. We provide renewable energy companies and investors with smarter navigation solutions for financing their solar, wind, and storage projects. We're a US\-based mission\-driven organization that operates at a fast pace. We value innovation, collaboration, diversity, and transparency.


CapeZero is looking for a high\-performing Django/Python Software Engineer to join our small team. As a backend Software Engineer, you will be responsible for building and improving our digital platform. You will work closely with financial modeling experts, other software engineers, product designers, and other stakeholders to build a robust backend system.


At CapeZero, you'll have the opportunity to work on innovative and meaningful projects that have a positive impact on the planet.

### **Responsibilities**

* Defining features and implementation specifications based on business requirements, working closely with the founders
* Understand the nuances of project finance and translate modeling needs to a robust backend data model and hence APIs that power the platform
* Identifying enhancements and modifications that improve product quality
* Fixing bugs, adding automated unit tests, and improving the usability/design of the APIs
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to develop, test, and maintain web\-based software applications using **Django/Python**.
* Design and implement **data models** and build on top of PostgreSQL
* Develop highly available and scalable RESTful APIs using Django Rest Framework (DRF)
* Help maintain automated testing and CI/CD pipelines using tools like **GitHub Actions**
* Participate in code reviews, bug triage, and provide feedback on technical designs.
* Encourage a culture of continuous improvement and learning for oneself and team members.

**Requirements**

* 5\+ years of experience in software engineering, with a focus on developing web\-based applications using Python and **Django**.
* In\-depth experience with Django Rest Framework (**DRF**).
* High proficiency in Git, Docker, and Linux systems.
* Experience with front\-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern JavaScript frameworks (specifically **React**).
* Knowledge of database design, SQL optimisation, and NoSQL databases
* Strong understanding of software testing and test\-driven development
* Experience with modern DevOps practices, such as continuous integration, delivery, and deployment. Experience with Fly, Railway, Render, or other modern cloud platforms preferred.
* Experience with **Pandas and Pydantic** will be handy.

**Nice\-to\-haves:**

* Previous experience working on a **B2B SaaS** product
* Experience with Pydantic AI or other LLM libraries
* Knowledge of a CSS preprocessor (LESS/Sass)
* Experience with E2E QA/Testing using Cypress
* You’ve built something cool on your own because you enjoy doing what you do
* Open source contributions
* University degree in Computer Science or related engineering field
* Passion for renewable energy and sustainability, and the desire to make a positive impact on the world

**Benefits**

* Competitive salary
* Opportunities for domestic and international travel
* A dynamic and fast\-paced work environment to grow in your career and make an impact.
* Remote work/work from home
* Paid Time Off

  

Please respond with the following **three important things**:

  

* A short **Cover Letter** describing why this role is a good fit for you
* A link to your **GitHub** / relevant work we can review online
* A **Resume** (and LinkedIn profile if you have one)


Also, putting the words "Django 5\.2 is an LTS release" in your cover letter will let us know that you took the time to read this post and have good attention to detail.

title: Senior Django/Python Software Engineer
description:
CapeZero (https://www.capezero.com/) is a seed\-stage cleantech startup making an impact at the intersection of clean energy, finance, and technology. We provide renewable energy companies and investors with smarter navigation solutions for financing their solar, wind, and storage projects. We're a US\-based mission\-driven organization that operates at a fast pace. We value innovation, collaboration, diversity, and transparency.


CapeZero is looking for a high\-performing Django/Python Software Engineer to join our small team. As a backend Software Engineer, you will be responsible for building and improving our digital platform. You will work closely with financial modeling experts, other software engineers, product designers, and other stakeholders to build a robust backend system.


At CapeZero, you'll have the opportunity to work on innovative and meaningful projects that have a positive impact on the planet.

### **Responsibilities**

* Defining features and implementation specifications based on business requirements, working closely with the founders
* Understand the nuances of project finance and translate modeling needs to a robust backend data model and hence APIs that power the platform
* Identifying enhancements and modifications that improve product quality
* Fixing bugs, adding automated unit tests, and improving the usability/design of the APIs
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to develop, test, and maintain web\-based software applications using **Django/Python**.
* Design and implement **data models** and build on top of PostgreSQL
* Develop highly available and scalable RESTful APIs using Django Rest Framework (DRF)
* Help maintain automated testing and CI/CD pipelines using tools like **GitHub Actions**
* Participate in code reviews, bug triage, and provide feedback on technical designs.
* Encourage a culture of continuous improvement and learning for oneself and team members.

**Requirements**

* 5\+ years of experience in software engineering, with a focus on developing web\-based applications using Python and **Django**.
* In\-depth experience with Django Rest Framework (**DRF**).
* High proficiency in Git, Docker, and Linux systems.
* Experience with front\-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern JavaScript frameworks (specifically **React**).
* Knowledge of database design, SQL optimisation, and NoSQL databases
* Strong understanding of software testing and test\-driven development
* Experience with modern DevOps practices, such as continuous integration, delivery, and deployment. Experience with Fly, Railway, Render, or other modern cloud platforms preferred.
* Experience with **Pandas and Pydantic** will be handy.

**Nice\-to\-haves:**

* Previous experience working on a **B2B SaaS** product
* Experience with Pydantic AI or other LLM libraries
* Knowledge of a CSS preprocessor (LESS/Sass)
* Experience with E2E QA/Testing using Cypress
* You’ve built something cool on your own because you enjoy doing what you do
* Open source contributions
* University degree in Computer Science or related engineering field
* Passion for renewable energy and sustainability, and the desire to make a positive impact on the world

**Benefits**

* Competitive salary
* Opportunities for domestic and international travel
* A dynamic and fast\-paced work environment to grow in your career and make an impact.
* Remote work/work from home
* Paid Time Off

  

Please respond with the following **three important things**:

  

* A short **Cover Letter** describing why this role is a good fit for you
* A link to your **GitHub** / relevant work we can review online
* A **Resume** (and LinkedIn profile if you have one)


Also, putting the words "Django 5\.2 is an LTS release" in your cover letter will let us know that you took the time to read this post and have good attention to detail.

title: Senior AI Engineer - Remote
description:
Jitterbit is seeking Senior backend engineers to join our AI team. Jitterbit is an iPaaS (Integration as a Service), LCAP, and API Management platform which has been recognized in Gartner MQ for seven straight years. Our customers utilize our Low\-code iPaaS, APIM, LCAP, and B2B platform to address mission\-critical business automation challenges. What is our challenge? To make it easy to automate our customers’ systems. In order to do this, we need to build and create a SaaS offering that is reliable, stable, and scalable for our customers. Do you have the design, architecting, and code\-writing capabilities to take on this challenge? And can succeed in a big way?

**About the Team**


The engineering team at Jitterbit believes that the quality of our code reflects directly on us as professionals. We are relentless about crafting a product that is innovative and delivers a memorable user experience; an experience that is fast and robust.


As a key engineer on our team, you will collaborate with other engineers, product management, and operations.


Our culture is fun, fast\-paced, performance\-oriented, open, and collegial. We are constantly pushing the technology envelope to the edge! We are very distributed, and our culture is set up to make all of us very effective working remotely. We believe in hiring talent where it exists.

**About the Job**


Join our team and play a crucial role in building, designing, and architecting AI capabilities on our cutting\-edge platform. We seek a talented Senior AI Engineer to infuse our AI vision into our platform. You'll work with various technologies, including LLM, RAG, Azure AI, AWS Bedrock, OpenAI, LangChain, LlamaIndex, Python, Java, Nginx, Tomcat, Kafka, Elasticsearch, InfluxDB, Redis, MySQL, Linux, C\+\+, Apache, Docker, and Kubernetes. Your mission will be to create robust, scalable AI systems that run seamlessly 24/7/365\. This is a unique opportunity to innovate with the latest technologies and contribute to our market\-leading position.

**About You**


You're an engineer with a knack for turning ideas into highly reliable and scalable designs. Your coding skills make your work easy for other engineers to understand, modify, and enhance. You believe in the transformative power of Business Automation and are committed to integrating systems and building applications efficiently.

**Qualifications**
------------------

**Success in this role requires:**

* Mentoring and helping others to grow as engineers and developers
* Have excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Ability to excel in a distributed, remote team environment
* Self\-drive to work on key initiatives
* Take pleasure in making things happen and listen to the input from peers
* Data\-driven decision\-making skills
* Embracing a best\-idea\-wins approach, regardless of the source
* Collaboration with cross\-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
* Staying current with emerging trends and technologies in AI and cloud computing

**We are looking for:**

* 10\+ years of experience in building large\-scale cloud\-based distributed applications
* Strong experience in building multi\-tenant SaaS applications
* Expertise with AI technologies, including LLM models, RAG, LangChain, and LlamaIndex
* Ability to design and develop scalable and robust AI\-driven applications
* Excellent problem\-solving, debugging, and analytical skills with great attention to detail
* Experience with microservices and cloud\-based architectures/design patterns
* Demonstrated proficiency in English at the C1 level

**Technical Skills:**

* Extensive experience in Python and Java
* Proficient with NLP libraries and tools (spaCy, NLTK, Hugging Face Transformers)
* Skilled in model deployment frameworks (TensorFlow Serving, MLflow, Kubernetes\-based deployments)
* Hands on Experience with ETL processes, data pipelines, and data warehousing solutions
* Expertise with top\-tier datastores (MongoDB, AWS DocumentDB, SQL Server, MySQL)
* Proficient in Linux
* Experience with Apache Tomcat, Nginx, AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI)
* Understanding of container orchestration tools and concepts
* Knowledge of security best practices in cloud and distributed applications
* Experience with infrastructure as code (IaC) tools (Terraform, CloudFormation).

**Join us to be part of an innovative team and make a significant impact on our AI\-driven future!**

  

\#LI\-AK

**Additional Information**
--------------------------

**What You’ll Get:**

* Work for a growing leader within the Integration Platform as a Service (iPaaS) tech space
* Join a mission\-driven company that is transforming the industry by changing the way customers use API creation within business\-critical processes.
* Career development and mentorship
* A flexible, remote\-friendly company with personality and heart


Jitterbit is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic factors, military/veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

title: Java Architect
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.


Job Description* Hands\-on experience with Java 8, Spring Boot, Hibernate/JPA, SQL , Microservices architecture,Docker,Kubernetes.
* Proficiency in Interface Design, including developing REST APIs and consuming Kafka Topics
* Experience with Azure Native Application Development, such as Azure Kubernetes and Application Insights would be a plus.
* Hands on experience in leading team is mandatory
* Experience on ReactJS or similar front\-end technologies would be a plus.
* EProactive, independently lead teams and deliver high\-quality outcomes.


.


Works in the area of Software Engineering, which encompasses the development, maintenance and optimization of software solutions/applications.1\. Applies scientific methods to analyse and solve software engineering problems.2\. He/she is responsible for the development and application of software engineering practice and knowledge, in research, design, development and maintenance.3\. His/her work requires the exercise of original thought and judgement and the ability to supervise the technical and administrative work of other software engineers.4\. The software engineer builds skills and expertise of his/her software engineering discipline to reach standard software engineer skills expectations for the applicable role, as defined in Professional Communities.5\. The software engineer collaborates and acts as team player with other software engineers and stakeholders.
Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55\-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end\-to\-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: Java Senior Developer - Joule
description:
**We help the world run better**  

At SAP, we keep it simple: you bring your best to us, and we'll bring out the best in you. We're builders touching over 20 industries and 80% of global commerce, and we need your unique talents to help shape what's next. The work is challenging – but it matters. You'll find a place where you can be yourself, prioritize your wellbeing, and truly belong. What's in it for you? Constant learning, skill growth, great benefits, and a team that wants you to grow and succeed. **Gen AI Senior Developer for Joule**

 **Yes! You read it right!!**


Here is an exciting opportunity for you to be a part of driving the development of SAP’s big rock investment JOULE. Join our team and get a chance to shape SAP’s vision and future in a ‘true sense’. It is an opportunity to be part of the next big ride of SAP!


As a Joule and Gen AI developer, you will play a crucial role in shaping SAP’s vision and future by working on building a platform that provides natural language processing capabilities and integrates seamlessly with other SAP products, ultimately serving the dream of one unified digital assistant for SAP powered by LLMs. As a senior developer of the team, you will be leading by example to the rest of the team.

 **We are looking for a person who brings,**

 **Technical competencies.**

* Technical languages: a minimum of 7\-10 years of hands\-on experience in Java, Spring Boot, Kafka, SAP HANA, Redis, SAP BTP, and the Playwright test framework. Strong conceptual clarity of OOPs.
* Component architecture: The great responsibility (comes with accountability) of architecting a piece of code that runs across all SAP systems for millions of users.


o Coding and Debugging: Write clean, efficient, well\-documented code, and actively participate in debugging and troubleshooting activities with the “ownership mindset”.


o Reviewing the peer's code: it is not just your code that breaks the application, but any crazy piece! You will have ownership of the scrum team’s code review.


o Software Development Lifecycle: Contribute to software solutions' development, testing, and deployment under the guidance and mentorship of experienced agile engineers. Participate and contribute to the design and architecture of your component. Participate in the code reviews.


o Own your deliverable: involvement in all agile phases to bring life to your code including testing.


o Pipeline ownership: Hands\-on understanding and experience of source repositories, Jenkins and CI\-CD principles.

**Right Mindset**


o Team first attitude. Ensure we win together as a team. Work together with other scrum team developers, cross\-functional and locational teams or cross lines of business. Remember you are building a solution for the entire suite of SAP applications.


o Processes are proven ways to meet the destination. Be serious about the Agile methodologies and live with it.


o Challenge the status quo. Always challenge the status quo. Always unlearn, relearn. Remember you will be working on cutting\-edge technologies every day you see a revolution.

 **The innovation mindset**


o Utilize the hype around Gen AI, Business AI and Joule. You will be in the best place to work on cutting\-edge technologies where things are rapidly evolving every day. Ensure you ride in the waves. Bring new ideas, concepts and prototypes in the cutting\-edge technologies’ alignment with the strategy.

**Meet your team:**


You will join the Joule team, which plays a pivotal role in today’s SAP’s Business AI Strategy. You will be working with the AI Functions team which is pioneering bringing the SAP’s Business AI Strategy into reality. Our AI organization supports SAP's customers in becoming Intelligent Enterprises by implementing our AI Winning Strategy. As a member of this team, you will have the opportunity to contribute to cutting\-edge AI technologies, and Gen AI technologies and make a significant impact on the future of business operations. If you are excited about working on groundbreaking projects, collaborating with talented professionals, and shaping the future of AI, we want to hear from you. Apply now and be a part of our dynamic and innovative team.a

 **Bring out your best**  

SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end\-to\-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose\-driven and future\-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.
  

  

**We win with inclusion**  

SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well\-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better world.  

  

SAP is committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provides accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e\-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com.  

  

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.  

  

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability, in compliance with applicable federal, state, and local legal requirements.  

  

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor. **AI Usage in the Recruitment Process**
For information on the responsible use of AI in our recruitment process, please refer to our Guidelines for Ethical Usage of AI in the Recruiting Process.
Please note that any violation of these guidelines may result in disqualification from the hiring process.

title: Senior Platform Engineer- SAP Generative AI Hub
description:
**We help the world run better**  

At SAP, we keep it simple: you bring your best to us, and we'll bring out the best in you. We're builders touching over 20 industries and 80% of global commerce, and we need your unique talents to help shape what's next. The work is challenging – but it matters. You'll find a place where you can be yourself, prioritize your wellbeing, and truly belong. What's in it for you? Constant learning, skill growth, great benefits, and a team that wants you to grow and succeed. **Meet Our Team**

  

SAP AI Product Engineering is part of the SAP Business AI unit and a key driver of the Intelligent Enterprise. Our mission is to infuse all enterprise applications with Artificial Intelligence capabilities, empowering our customers to maximize their business data.  

We are responsible for foundational products such as SAP Generative AI Hub, AI Core, and AI Launchpad that help application developers embed AI capabilities into their solutions. Our global teams are located in Germany, Singapore, and India, working in an innovative, start\-up\-like environment where ideas are nurtured and cutting\-edge solutions are built.

**What You’ll Do**

  

As a Senior Platform Engineer , you will take end\-to\-end ownership of key platform components within SAP AI Core and the Generative AI Hub. You will design, build, optimize, and operate foundational services that power SAP’s enterprise AI ecosystem.  

This is a hands\-on senior engineering role with a clear exposure to architectural responsibilities. You will influence system design, own cross\-domain technical flows, and gradually evolve into an architectural leader while still actively coding.

 **End\-to\-End Engineering Ownership**

* Own backend/platform components across design, development, testing, deployment, and operational support.
* Deliver complex features independently with high ownership and transparency.
* Drive deep technical investigations, performance tuning, and reliability improvements.
 **System Design**  

Participate in architectural discussions and propose scalable, secure, and maintainable design enhancements.  

* Write technical design documents, sequence diagrams, and flow specifications.
* Understand and contribute to cross\-component flows (executions, pipelines, monitoring, provisioning, model lifecycle)
* Evaluate technology choices, integration patterns, and long\-term platform evolution.
 **Core Platform Engineering Responsibilities**  

* Build cloud\-native microservices using Python / Java / Go
* Design secure, scalable APIs and integrate with SAP BTP and hyperscaler services.
* Enhance observability with logging, metrics, tracing, dashboards, and alerts.
* Improve CI/CD pipelines, automation, and developer productivity tooling.
* Implement strong engineering and security best practices.
 **DevOps, Stability \& Performance Engineering**  

* Support productive customer workloads and internal platform consumers.
* Troubleshoot incidents, analyze root causes, and drive permanent fixes.
* Improve system throughput, performance, resilience, and cost efficiency.
* Ensure platform reliability through automated testing and continuous improvements.

**Collaboration \& Mentoring**  

* Mentor junior engineers through code reviews and technical guidance.
* Collaborate closely with global teams across time zones.
* Contribute to org\-wide engineering initiatives and platform\-wide improvements.
**What You Bring**  

* Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* 5–10 years of strong experience in software/platform engineering.
* Strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, OOP, design patterns, and software design principles
* Deep understanding of algorithms, distributed systems, API design, microservices, and clean coding principles.
* Hands\-on experience with Kubernetes, Docker, cloud\-native patterns, and deployment on BTP or AWS/Azure/GCP.
* Expertise in at least one modern programming language: Python, Java, Go, TypeScript.
* Proven experience building and operating microservices at scale.
* Strong debugging and problem\-solving capabilities across distributed systems.
* Solid experience with CI/CD systems (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI).
* Working knowledge of Infrastructure\-as\-Code (Terraform or equivalent).
* Exposure to Generative AI, LLMs, embeddings, or RAG architectures.
* Ability to drive technical direction, write design proposals, and make trade\-off decisions.
* Excellent communication, ownership mindset, and proactive attitude
  

Why Join Us?  

At SAP, you’ll work on the forefront of AI and cloud innovation, learning from experts while making a direct impact on how enterprises leverage AI. You’ll have the opportunity to grow your career, collaborate globally, and work in a fast\-paced, innovation\-driven culture.

 **Bring out your best**  

SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end\-to\-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose\-driven and future\-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.
  

  

**We win with inclusion**  

SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well\-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better world.  

  

SAP is committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provides accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e\-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com.  

  

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.  

  

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability, in compliance with applicable federal, state, and local legal requirements.  

  

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor. **AI Usage in the Recruitment Process**

* Experience with infrastructure as code (IaC) tools (Terraform, CloudFormation).

**Join us to be part of an innovative team and make a significant impact on our AI\-driven future!**

  

\#LI\-AK

 **Additional Information** **What You’ll Get:**

* Work for a growing leader within the Integration Platform as a Service (iPaaS) tech space
* Join a mission\-driven company that is transforming the industry by changing the way customers use API creation within business\-critical processes.
* Career development and mentorship
* A flexible, remote\-friendly company with personality and heart


Jitterbit is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic factors, military/veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

title: AI Tech Lead
description:
Supplier.io is the market leader in supplier intelligence, trusted by over half of the Fortune 100 to power smarter, more responsible sourcing decisions. Our platform helps corporate procurement teams discover, evaluate, and engage with over 11 million suppliers with a focus on local, small, diverse, and sustainable businesses. This helps organizations build supply chains that are resilient, inclusive, and built for impact.

  

Our solutions empower today’s procurement teams with accurate data, actionable insights, and measurable impact, which helps them mitigate risk, expand sourcing options, achieve ESG goals, and advance economic inclusion. Whether tracking spend, sourcing alternate suppliers, or measuring program results, Supplier.io transforms complexity into clarity; empowering teams to lead with confidence and build supply chains that deliver for both business and community.

  

Join a company committed to innovation, inclusion, and making a difference one sourcing decision at a time. For more information, visit www.supplier.io.

  

Reports to: CTO


Number of Direct Reports: N/A


Location: Hyderabad, India


Working Shift: UK/Hybrid (2 days a week at office)

**The Opportunity**


We are at an exciting stage in our AI journey. Supplier.io is embedding advanced AI capabilities across its data and product ecosystem to accelerate innovation and deliver smarter, more personalized sourcing experiences.


The AI Technical Lead will serve as the CTO’s right hand in designing, developing, and implementing AI solutions that power Supplier.io’s next\-generation platform. This is a hands\-on individual contributor role focused on deep technical expertise, architecture, and execution, not people management. The ideal candidate will bring strong experience with LLM architecture, RAG systems, and agentic frameworks alongside a solid foundation in machine learning and data engineering.

 **What You Will Do**

* **AI Architecture \& System Design**


o Architect, prototype, and deploy large language model (LLM) and retrieval\-augmented generation (RAG) systems that enhance Supplier.io products.


o Design scalable architectures for integrating LLMs into production workflows—balancing cost, latency, and performance.


o Develop agentic AI workflows to automate complex tasks such as supplier search, enrichment, classification, and insights generation.

* **Collaboration \& Leadership**


o Partner closely with AI Engineers to define implementation details, guide development, and ensure code quality and performance.


o Collaborate with Product Managers and the CTO to translate business objectives into robust AI technical solutions.


o Establish best practices for model orchestration, evaluation, and continuous improvement.

* **Research \& Innovation**


o Explore emerging frameworks (LangChain, LlamaIndex, CrewAI, AutoGen, etc.) and assess their applicability to Supplier.io use cases.


o Prototype, benchmark, and refine LLM\-driven components for semantic search, summarization, supplier matching, and recommendation systems.


o Drive experimentation to evaluate open\-source and proprietary LLMs, embeddings, and vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Chroma, Weaviate).

* **Operational Excellence**


o Define observability, testing, and deployment standards for AI components across environments.


o Work with DevOps and Data Engineering to optimize pipelines for scalability and cost efficiency.


o Contribute to model governance, documentation, and reproducibility practices.

* **Security, Privacy \& Compliance**


o Ensure all LLM and RAG implementations follow security best practices related to data confidentiality, PII handling, and prompt injection prevention.


o Partner with Legal/Security to ensure compliance with SOC 2, GDPR, and other relevant standards.

* **AI Roadmap \& Strategy Contribution**


o Contribute to the annual AI roadmap by proposing scalable LLM\-powered features, tools, and platform investments.


 Evaluate build\-vs\-buy decisions for vendor AI tools and foundational models.

 **What You Will Bring**

* 7\+ years of experience in AI/ML engineering, with 3\+ years of recent focus on LLM, NLP, or RAG\-based architectures.
* Proven experience designing and deploying AI systems in production using frameworks like LangChain, LlamaIndex, Hugging Face, or Ray.
* Strong understanding of LLM architecture, embeddings, fine\-tuning, and inference optimization.
* Proficiency in Python and modern ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit\-learn).
* Experience with vector databases (Pinecone, Chroma, FAISS, Weaviate) and cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, or Azure).
* Familiarity with agentic AI frameworks and multi\-agent orchestration concepts.
* Working knowledge of MLOps, model evaluation, and continuous delivery pipelines.
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills with the ability to influence technical direction across teams.

 **Why Join Supplier.io**

* Collaborate directly with the CTO on shaping and executing the company’s AI roadmap.
* Work on real\-world AI systems powering the leading supplier intelligence platform trusted by global enterprises.
* Build and ship production\-grade AI features that impact procurement and sourcing outcomes at scale.
* Be part of a fast\-moving, innovation\-driven culture that values creativity, ownership, and results.

title: Principle Enterprise Software Engineer
description:
At Medtronic you can begin a life\-long career of exploration and innovation, while helping champion healthcare access and equity for all. You’ll lead with purpose, breaking down barriers to innovation in a more connected, compassionate world.


**A Day in the Life**
=====================

You will read, analyze, understand product requirements
  

You will actively participate in story grooming
  

You will participate in test case documentation and reviews
  

You will Learn and understand software standards for Medical devices
  

You will under general direction and collaboratively with internal and external partners.
**Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned:**

* **12\+ years of experience in test automation for software desktop, Web, Mobile \& embedded applications.**
* Solid understanding of desktop, web, Mobile \& embedded application architectures and testing methodologies.
* Define, architect, and implement a **unified automation strategy** that supports Desktop, Web, Mobile, Embedded, API, and Cloud testing.
* Build and enhance scalable frameworks using **Python,** **Selenium, Appium, Test Complete, Winappdriver and Katalon Studio** with support for parallel execution and CI/CD integration.
* Introduce and institutionalize **AI\-driven automation practices** , including self\-healing tests, visual verification, and intelligent object recognition.
* Establish best practices for test code design, reusability, and maintainability across projects.
* Integrate automation suites into CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, Azure DevOps, GitLab CI).
* Evaluate and introduce new\-age tools and frameworks aligned with enterprise architecture and technology roadmap.
* Lead and mentor teams of automation engineers, fostering innovation and skill development in emerging tools like Katalon, Playwright, Cypress, and AI\-assisted frameworks.
* Define measurable automation KPIs (coverage, stability, ROI) and present progress and insights to leadership.
* Ability to work on cross\-functional project teams comprised of software verification and development engineers, system engineers, human factor engineers and quality engineers.
* Proficiency in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test cases.
* Excellent problem\-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work effectively in a fast\-paced, dynamic environment.
* Familiarity with Agile software test methods.
* Good logical and reasoning skills.

**Required knowledge and experience:**

**Technical**

* Strong programming expertise in Python, Java \& C\# (optional : LabVIEW)
* Web Automation: Selenium, Test Complete, Katalon Studio.
* Mobile Automation: Appium, Katalon Mobile Studio.
* Desktop Automation: WinAppDriver, Pywinauto, White, or custom frameworks.
* API Automation: RestAssured, Postman, or Katalon API.
* Embedded test automation will be an added advantage.
* Deep understanding of automation architecture, design patterns (Page Object, Screenplay), and reusable componentization.
* Experience integrating automation in CI/CD pipelines

**AI \& Innovation**

* Familiarity with AI\-powered testing tools (Ex:Katalon AI).
* Exposure to GenAI, prompt engineering, and machine learning concepts relevant to test optimization.
* Ability to leverage AI for test selection, data generation, and failure pattern analysis.

**Leadership \& Strategic**

* Strong experience in defining automation roadmaps, tool evaluation, and ROI justification.
* Ability to lead large distributed automation teams and drive capability building across multiple product lines.
* Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and presentation skills.
* Define test strategy to improve the test coverage.

**Minimum Qualification**

* Required: Bachelor of Engineering or Bachelor of Technology in Computer Sciences, Biotechnology, Bio\-Medical, Electronics or Electrical Engineering.
* Preferred: \- Maters in Engineering or master’s in technology computer sciences, Bio\-Technology, Bio\-Medical, Electronics or Electrical Engineering.

**Principal Working Relationship**

* You will report to Engineering Manager, R\&D
* You will interacts with Test Lead, other developers, V\&V engineers, internal partners and stakeholders concerning design, implementation or requirement clarifications, works closely with global sites.

**Nice to Haves**

* Design/develop experience working with regulated medical devices.
* Experience working within a regulated environment.
* Experience with software version control tools.
* Quality focus, willingness to learn, versatility and adaptability.

**Physical Job Requirements**  

  

The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by employees assigned to this position, but they are not an exhaustive list of all the required responsibilities and skills of this position.


**Benefits \& Compensation**
============================

**Medtronic offers a competitive Salary and flexible Benefits Package**  

A commitment to our employees lives at the core of our values. We recognize their contributions. They share in the success they help to create. We offer a wide range of benefits, resources, and competitive compensation plans designed to support you at every career and life stage.  

  



This position is eligible for a short\-term incentive called the Medtronic Incentive Plan (MIP).
**About Medtronic**
===================

We lead global healthcare technology and boldly attack the most challenging health problems facing humanity by searching out and finding solutions.
  

Our Mission — to alleviate pain, restore health, and extend life — unites a global team of 95,000\+ passionate people.
  

We are engineers at heart— putting ambitious ideas to work to generate real solutions for real people. From the R\&D lab, to the factory floor, to the conference room, every one of us experiments, creates, builds, improves and solves. We have the talent, diverse perspectives, and guts to engineer the extraordinary.
